content: Hello! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can I assist you today? We offer plumbing, electrical, and HVAC services. May I have your name to get started?
Thank you, Rick! Can you please provide your address so we can check if you're in our service area?
You know, I actually don't want to continue with this. Please don't contact me again.
reason: Customer requested not to be contacted further.
